{"step_by_step_thinking": "Thyroid storm is a life-threatening condition that can be precipitated by various factors. According to the provided documents, the causes of thyroid storm include abrupt discontinuation of antithyroid medicine, thyroid surgery, non-thyroid surgery, trauma, acute illnesses like infections, parturition, recent use of iodinated contrast medium, radioiodine therapy (rare), burns, stroke or traumatic brain injury, medication side effects, and hyperemesis gravidarum in pregnancy. None of the provided choices directly match these causes. Therefore, none of the options A, B, C, or D are correct.", "answer_choice": "None of the above"}
